root.message: The OTHER_DOC field for indicator 3-3-5, translated into en
root.data:
URL:

https://www.who.int/teams/control-of-neglected-tropical-diseases

References:

Ending the neglect to attain the Sustainable Development Goals: A road map for neglected tropical diseases 2021–2030. Geneva: World Health Organization; 2021 (https://www.who.int/teams/control-of-neglected-tropical-diseases/ending-ntds-together-towards-2030, accessed 14 February 2022).

Accelerating work to overcome the global impact of neglected tropical diseases: A Roadmap for Implementation. Geneva: World Health Organization; 2012 (https://www.who.int/neglected_diseases/NTD_RoadMap_2012_Fullversion.pdf, accessed 29 March 2015).

Investing to overcome the global impact of neglected tropical diseases. Geneva: World Health Organization; 2015 (https://apps.who.int/iris/bitstream/handle/10665/152781/9789241564861_eng.pdf ,accessed 29 March 2015).
